data.message: Sorry for being mean. I took a nap and woke up and felt bad. I bet this thing was recorded yesterday. So your free right now. Waiting to be on tv. Sounds. Like a famous person thing. Anwyay. I bet you will or did do a amazing piece of televised work. Even tho. Like. Ugh. Why. Gr. Ugh.ugh.    ughhhhhhhh.... Anyway. Happy thanksgiving. Thats not something i just say to people. So. Dont expect to hear it actually. On? Thanksgiving. Just relax.
